name: Mr. Slime - Arcade Madness - Round2
description:
will update before the round is over! plan on adding sounds and UI, and whatever the issues are. please leave feedback! let me know on any bugs thanks! 

there are currently 2 Slime Coins as of now! if you do not see the bounce slime coin (Pink slime coin), you lost, and must try again. I'm aware of the block and dodge window being very small to pull of as of now.

Controls for the Mini game are displayed right before you play it!

control for movement and summon slimes:

move :WASD or ARROW KEYS

jump: W or UP arrow or Space

to summon:

Z: for Stone Slime

X: for Bouncy Slime

C: for Right facing fire slime

SHIFT KEY: for Left facing fire slime

TO KILL THE SLIMES PRESS: ENTER
